actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries of polytetrafluoroethylene.

summary.text: Directs the Customs Service, upon request, to liquidate or reliquidate as free from duty specified entries of polytetrafluoroethylene, notwithstanding any provision of the Tariff Act of 1930. Requires the Customs Service to refund any duties paid with respect to such entries, including interest. Sets a time limit for reliquidation requests.

titles.title: To provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries of polytetrafluoroethylene.
